title: eSIM Vulnerability in Kigen's eUICC Cards Exposes Billions of IoT Devices to Malicious Attacks
summary:
Cybersecurity researchers have discovered a new hacking technique that exploits weaknesses in the eSIM technology used in modern smartphones, exposing users to severe risks.
The issues impact the Kigen eUICC card. According to the Irish company's website, more than two billion SIMs in IoT devices ha

title: Windows 10 KB5062554 update breaks emoji panel search feature
summary: The search feature for the Windows 10 emoji panel is broken after installing the KB5062554 cumulative update released Tuesday, making it not possible to look up emojis by name or keyword. [...]
